text: Mei geren de qianmian he houmian, dou you xuduo jiezhong er lai de tianshen, tamen feng zhenzhu de mingling er jianhu ta. Zhenzhu biding bu biangeng renhe minzhong de qingkuang, zhidao tamen biangeng ziji de qingkuang. Dangzhenzhu yu jiang zaihai yu renhe minzhong de shihou, na zaihai shi buke kangju de. Chu zhenzhu wai, tamen jue wu baoyou zhe
